summary: This document is a series of official inmate count sheets and rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records the population counts by housing unit and includes a specific inmate roster for the hospital unit, listing four inmates by name and registration number.

persons.name: Bullock
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the hospital unit (HOSP) with registration number 86409-054 on the inmate roster dated August 10, 2019.

persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the hospital unit (HOSP) with registration number 48816-066 on the inmate roster dated August 10, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
It is a routine administrative record showing inmate counts by housing unit and a specific roster for the hospital unit.
Four inmates are named in the hospital unit roster: Bullock, Santana, Walker, and Woolaston.
The total inmate population recorded is 758, with detailed breakdowns by unit (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, K-S).
The document series includes multiple 'Official Count Slips' for various units, all timed around 1:20-1:21 AM.
